title: Belmont-sur-Montreux railway station
summary: Belmont-sur-Montreux railway station (French: Gare de Belmont-sur-Montreux) is a railway station in the municipality of Montreux, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is located on the  1,000 mm (3 ft 3+3⁄8 in) Montreux–Lenk im Simmental line of the Montreux Oberland Bernois Railway.
content:
Belmont-sur-Montreux railway station (French: Gare de Belmont-sur-Montreux) is a railway station in the municipality of Montreux, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is located on the  1,000 mm (3 ft 3+3⁄8 in) Montreux–Lenk im Simmental line of the Montreux Oberland Bernois Railway.


== Services ==
As of the December 2021 timetable change, the following services stop at Belmont-sur-Montreux:
Regio: hourly service between Montreux and Les Avants.
